DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer undergo euglycaemic hyperinsulinaemic clamp microdialysis administration 10mg olanzapine 80mg ziprasidone 10 day .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Treatment With Olanzapine Ziprasidone Transcapillary Glucose Transport Human Skeletal Muscle
DOC.detailed_description: Background : The efficacy atypical antipsychotic , olanzapine , clozapine , risperidone , quetiapine ziprasidone treat broad spectrum symptom schizophrenia well low likelihood extrapyramidal symptom lead increase use substance . However ongoing debate whether treatment atypical antipsychotic associate high risk metabolic abnormality . The FDA state 2003 atypical antipsychotic increase risk glucose abnormality . For olanzapine many , study report increase risk development metabolic abnormality , glucose intolerance , insulin-resistance consequentially NIDDM ( Non-Insulin-Dependent-Diabetes Mellitus ) . Ziprasidone hand seem associate favorable metabolic safety profile.Glucose intolerance insulin resistance risk factor development NIDDM cardiovascular disease , exact determination putative effect atypical antipsychotic insulin sensitivity resistance great need . An innovative technique , microdialysis , allow measurement various analytes interstitial space , i.e . assess insulin sensitivity directly responsible compartment , human skeletal muscle . With use microdialysis possible determine arterial interstitial gradient , suitable marker plasma glucose extraction peripheral tissue , thus detect insulin resistance directly site insulin action . Aim study : To compare effect treatment atypical antipsychotic olanzapine ziprasidone steady-state condition arterial interstitial skeletal muscle gradient glucose human skeletal muscle euglycaemic hyperinsulinaemic clamp condition male healthy volunteer . Study design : Open , randomize , mono-center study . Materials method : Healthy volunteer undergo euglycaemic hyperinsulinaemic clamp microdialysis administration 10mg olanzapine 80mg ziprasidone 10 day . Study population : 15 healthy volunteer participate arm study , sum total 30 participant . Main outcome variable : The arterial interstitial skeletal muscle glucose gradient euglycaemic hyperinsulinaemic clamp condition , administration 10mg olanzapine 80mg ziprasidone steady-state condition .
DOC.criteria: Age 1855 Healthy male volunteer No history drug alcohol abuse No regular nicotine consumption time enrollment Physical activity least twice week Body mass Index 1924 kg/m2 Normal laboratory value Normotension ( blood pressure le 140/90 ) No past present history psychiatric disorder No family history diabetes obesity Written inform consent Use medication within last 14 day Consumption alcohol within last 5 day Family history diabetes obesity Past present psychiatric disorder
